name: js/App.js
js/Distraction.js
resetPopUp
description:
This function will make the pop up disappear
and remove any of the text in the 'description' field.

name: js/Timer/Timer.js
Timer
description:
A class for the Timer object. Has functions to start the timer,
display the current mode of the timer and display the time remaining
Class throws the 'timer-complete' event

name: constructor
description:
Constructor of Time Object. Takes the HTML element of where
you want the time and the status of the timer to be implemented.
HTML Elements must have the 'textElement' attribute.

name: state
description: State of the timer (the current mode)

name: stateQueue
description:
Queue that stores the Session objects. Rotates to provide
rotation functionality for the timer

name: startButton
description: HTML Tag that is reponsible for controlling the timer

name: displayTime
description: HTML Tag that is reponsible for displaying the time remaining

name: displayStatus
description: HTML Tag that is reponsible for displaying the mode of the timer

name: end
description: Checks if session has ended

name: onTimerComplete
description:
Function that fires when the timer runs out of time.
Moves on to start the timer again at the end of the function.

name: startTimer
description:
Starts the timer for the session at the top of the queue.
Updates the display for the status.

name: endTimer
description:
Ends the timer.
Updates the display for the status.

name: countdown
description:
Counts down the timer for duration amount of minutes.
Updates the DOM with current time remaining.

params.name: duration
params.description: Amount of seconds for the timer to run

name: addEventListeners
description: Adds event listener to the start button that was added

name: js/Timer/TimerVariables.js
js/ToDoList/Task.js
Task
description:
Task object, stores its id, task name, total expected Pomo Sessions to complete the Task,
the number of the current Pomo Session, and whether the task has been completed or not.

name: constructor
description: Task construcutor. Initializes the task with appropriate attributes

params.name: totalSessions
params.description: Total sessions the task should take

name: id
description: Stores the id of the task

name: name
description: Stores the name of the task

name: totalSessions
description: Stores the total sessions anticipated for the task

name: currentSessionNum
description: Stores the total amount of sessions spent working on the task

name: checked
description: Stores if the task has been checked off or not

name: checkBox
description: The checkbox attribute for the task

name: taskText
description: Stores the view that shows the task name to the user

name: pomoSessions
description:
Stores the view that displayes the total pomo sessions spent
and alloted for the tasl

name: deleteButton
description: The delete button for the task

name: deleted
description: Keeps track if the task was deleted or not (used with the Todolist )

name: setupCheckBox
description: This sets up the checkbox to check off tasks

name: setupTaskText
description: This sets up the view that will display the task name

name: setupTotalPomoSessions
description: This sets up the view that will display the pomo sessions

name: setupDeleteButton
description:
This sets up the delete button for a task
Delete only works visually, doesn't remove it from the TodoList
Data Structure

name: removeFromLocalStorage
description: Removes a task from local storage given the id

name: updateText
description: Update method to edit task name

name: updatePomoSessions
description: This updates the pomo sessions when a session is complete

name: incrementSession
description: Increment this task's current session number. Checks off task if all sessions completed.

throws.description:
Incrementing a completed tasks' session number
(all sessions have been completed or user has checked off task manually)

name: updateLocalStorage
description: This updates the localStorage whenever session increases or checked off

name: checkOffTask
description: Marks a task as completed

name: js/ToDoList/TaskVariables.js
js/ToDoList/ToDoList.js
ToDoList
description:
Queue based TodoList data structure which holds Task objects.
API-like methods to perform operations on the underlying queue

name: constructor
description: Initializes the todolist array and the counter for id's

name: taskList
description: Array that stores each task

name: idCounter
description:
This is the total task count that is also a way
to give each task a unique id

name: addTask
description: Verifies that incoming parameters are non-empty and defined, then creates Task

unknown.tagValue: {Task} Task object to be placed into DOM

return.description: Task object to be placed into DOM

throws.description: Task name is an empty string
Expected number of pomo sessions is undefined
Expected number of pomo sessions is 0

name: addTaskToLocalStorage
description: Adds a task to local storage

name: getCurrentTask
description:
Gets the first unchecked task in the todolist.
Returns null if no such task exists

name: js/ToDoList/TodoListDom.js
TodoListDom
description:
Class responsible for providing changes to the DOM for the TodoList
Encapsulates the TodoList class
Done so their is a clear abstraction from DOM Manipulation and Data Manipulation

name: constructor
description: Initializes the TodoListDom object with its correct member variables

name: todoList
description: Holds the TodoList so the Dom Manager can acess it

name: form
description: The form where users input their task

name: submitBtn
description: The button where users click to submit their todo's

name: deleteAllBtn
description: The button where users click to delete their todo's

name: table
description: The table where the todolist is displayed

name: renderLocalStorage
description:
Fetch local storage, and store them into window.localData
Iterate each local tasks and render them

name: setupEventListeners
description: Sets up the form dissapearing and submit event listeners

name: displayTask
description: Adds a task to the table of task

name: onSessionComplete
description: This function runs when the timer is done with its working session

name: js/ToDoList/TodoListDomVariables.js
